nodes.bodyText: This one appears to be unused but it's the only thing questionable about the whole PR, looks good otherwise, and I'm sure this is used somewhere

Those constants are actually used. However, they are never assigned to a variable. They are directly but in the JSONObject where they belong or compared to the current value of a JSONObject. I still assumed that creating all the types simultaneously would still be nice, potentially useful later, and in this case, would require less work to do it all simultaneously
Agreed on that, okay then - thanks for clarifying
